page.title: 18Amusement Arcades
page.content: Arcades vary from a building with just a few slot machines to one with many, plus a pool room,bingo and cafeteria. Coloured flashing lights and pop music attract people to them.Coins are put into machines by persons hoping to win money,often on games of chance. Some- times a little skill is called for by guiding a grab or a ball.Up to Â£1.50 winnings are paid out in 10p coins but over that amount is paid in tokens which are then used for further games. In some cases,10 tokens can be changed for One Win on the Bingo.There are cashiers to give change and bouncers in case of trouble.Most of the punters are teen-age holidaymakers.No local people are allowed in some of the arcades as they know the machines so well and can fiddle them.
